Pre-Game Insights: New Orleans travels to Orlando looking to break its three-game road skid.
Orlando finished 47-35 overall a season ago while going 29-12 at home.
The Magic averaged 110.5 points per game last season, 51.8 in the paint, 18.6 off of turnovers and 12.4 on fast breaks.
New Orleans went 49-33 overall a season ago while going 28-14 on the road.
The Pelicans averaged 115.1 points per game while allowing opponents to score 110.7 last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Injuries: Magic - Paolo Banchero: out (abdomen), Wendell Carter Jr.: out (foot).

Injuries: Pelicans - Trey Murphy III: out (hamstring), Jordan Hawkins: day to day (back), CJ McCollum: out (adductor), Herbert Jones: out (shoulder ), Dejounte Murray: out (hand), Zion Williamson: day to day (hamstring)
